channel.title: Tabloids on Fans of Le Fox Library
channel.description: Recent content in Tabloids on Fans of Le Fox Library

item.title: Star Magazine
item.description: For three years, CSI investigators Sara Sidle (played by Jorja Fox, 34) and Warrick Brown (Gary Dourdan, 37) have worked side by side, exchanging polite professional words. But at the People’s Choice Awards on Jan 11, the actors Fox and Dourdan snuck off repeatedly to hold hands and share smokes. The couple was spotted kissing by several backstage guests. ‘They couldn’t keep their hands off each other,’ a backstage photographer tell Star.

item.title: National Examiner
item.description: There’s a battle royal going on behind the scenes at CSI: Crime Scene Investigation — should Gil Grissom leap into the sack with Sara Sidle? Fans of TV’s top-rated show, now in its fourth season, think it’s a pretty hot drama. But backstage fights over what should happen between the characters played by William Petersen and Jorja Fox make the on-screen happenings seem like winter in Antarctica, say insiders. “The production team has been torn apart,” a source says.
